CustomField.formula: CASE(text(Subscription_Group__c), 'Hospitality Hosted Solutions', "Batch1", 'Customer Billing Hold',"Batch3", 'Enterprise Ticketing',"Batch6", 'Cinema',"Batch5", 'Digital Insight',"Batch4", 'Migration', "Batch2", 'Finance eMarketing', "Batch7", 'Transportation', "Batch8", 'Retail eMarketing', "Batch9", 'Retail Connected Payment and Services', "Batch10", 'PCR Cloud', "Batch11", 'Retail NSS', "Batch12", 'Digital Insight- Billing Hold', "Batch13", 'Retail Omnichannel Decision Service Platform', "Batch14", 'Hospitality Partnerships', "Batch15", 'Do Not Bill Hospitality On Hold', "Batch16", 'Do Not Bill Retail On Hold', "Batch17", 'Digital Insight - Customer Watchlist', "Batch18", 'Zipscene', "Batch19", 'Retail Optic', "Batch20", 'Unassigned', "Batch50", 'As-A-Service', "Batch21", "" )
CustomField.label: Subscription Invoice Batch
